          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how electrolysis occurs in acidified water.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'électrolyse

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la electrólisis
